wikipedia_page.main: Peter Hardcastle was an English professional footballer who played as a full back. Active for three clubs between 1971 and 1978, Hardcastle made over 100 appearances in the Football League.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players

response: Peter Hardcastle is the name of:
*Peter Hardcastle (footballer), English professional footballer active in the 1970s
*Peter Hardcastle (rower) (born 1978), Australian three time Olympic rower.
